meanings.sent1: The effulgent sun warmed the earth.
meanings.sent2: Her effulgent smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent3: The effulgent glow of the fireflies made the night magical.
meanings.sent4: The effulgent stars in the night sky guided the lost travelers.
meanings.sent5: The effulgent moon cast a silver glow over the landscape.
